revision.text:
{{Wikifiedrecipe}} [[Image:1399998107.jpg|thumb| Chili Rice Salad]]
== Ingredients == * 1 pkt Uncle Ben's [[instant rice|fast cooking Spanish rice]] * 2 cup light [[red kidney bean]]s, well drained * 2 cup [[green bell pepper|green pepper]], chopped * 1 cup [[onion]], finely shopped * 1 cup [[vegetable oil|salad oil]] * 3 tbsp [[vinegar]] * 1 tbsp [[chili powder]] * ½ tsp [[hot pepper sauce]], ([[tabasco]])
== Directions == # Prepare [[rice]] according to the instructions on the package, omitting the [[margarine]]. # Cool slightly. # Add [[red kidney bean|beans]], [[green bell pepper|green peppers]] and [[onion]]s. # Combine [[vegetable oil|salad oil]], [[vinegar]], [[chili powder]], and[[hot pepper sauce]]. # Stir into the [[rice]] mixture. # Chill well before serving.
[[Category:Spanish Salads]] [[Category:Instant rice Recipes]] [[Category:Green bell pepper Recipes]] [[Category:Red kidney bean Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]]

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description ==
[[Image:1026873463.jpg|thumb| Chilled Vegetables ]]
=== Ingredients ===
* frozen mixed vegetables as many large bags as needed * 1 x [[cucumber]] per bag of veggies * [[green onions]] to taste including the green part * 5 x fresh [[plum tomato]]es * low-fat or non-fat [[Mayonnaise]] * [[salt]] and [[pepper]]
== Directions ==
* Parboil the vegetables (don't let them get too cooked) * Drain the vegetables well. * Dice and add the [[cucumber]], [[tomato]]es, and [[green onions]]. * Mix in the [[mayonnaise|mayo]] to bind it together. * [[salt]] and [[pepper]] to taste. For some reason it needs a heavier hand than you'd think with the [[pepper]] * Chill well.
== See also ==
[[Category:Colombian Recipes]] [[Category:Colombian Salads]] [[Category:Cucumber Recipes]] [[Category:Mayonnaise Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Plum tomato Recipes]]

=== Ingredients === * 3 1/2 boneless [[Chicken]] breast halves, cooked and diced * 1 [[iceberg lettuce|head lettuce]], torn into small pieces * 4 [[green onions]], sliced * 4 stalks [[celery]], sliced thin * 1/2 cup [[walnuts]], chopped * 2 tablespoons [[sesame seed]]s, toasted * 6 ounces [[Chinese noodles]], heated briefly to crisp * 6 tablespoons [[seasoned rice vinegar]] * 4 tablespoons [[granulated sugar|white sugar]] * 1 teaspoon [[salt]] * 1/2 cup [[peanut oil]]
== Directions ==
1 - Mix together [[Chicken]], [[lettuce]], [[green onions|green onion]], [[celery]], [[nuts]], seeds and noodles and toss
2 - Add [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]], [[vinegar]], and [[oil]] together to create dressing. add the dressing to the salad
=== Other Links ===
== See also ==
[[Category:Chicken Recipes]] [[Category:Chinese Recipes]] [[Category:Chinese Salads]] [[Category:Iceberg lettuce Recipes]] [[Category:Lettuce Recipes]] [[Category:Lettuce Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Peanut oil Recipes]] [[Category:Recipes that need photos]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]]

== Description ==
=== Ingredients === * 8 ounces dry [[fettuccine]] [[Pasta]] * 2 tablespoons natural [[Peanut]] [[butter]] * 1/2 cup [[vegetable stock|vegetable broth]] * 2 tablespoons [[soy sauce]] * 3 cloves [[garlic]], minced * 2 teaspoons [[red pepper flakes|crushed red pepper]] flakes * 1 red [[bell pepper]], chopped * 2 [[green onions]], chopped * 1/2 cup chopped fresh [[cilantro]]
== Directions ==
1 - Boil paste till tender approx 7 – 10 minutes
2 - Mix [[Peanut]] [[butter]], broth, soy sauce, [[garlic]], and [[red pepper flakes|crushed red pepper]] together. Add [[Pasta]], sliced red pepper, scallions, and [[cilantro]]. Toss and serve directly.
=== Other Links ===
== See also ==
[[Category:Chinese Recipes]] [[Category:Chinese Salads]] [[Category:Fettuccine Recipes]] [[Category:Pasta Recipes]] [[Category:Recipes that need photos]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Vegetable stock and broth Recipes]]

== Description == Makes 6 servings.
=== Ingredients === * 1/2 cup [[Mayonnaise]] * 4 teaspoons [[lemon juice]] * 4 teaspoons [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]] * 1/4 teaspoon [[salt]] * 3 cups cooked [[rice]], cooled * 1 12-1/2-ounce can [[Tuna]], packed in [[water]], drained * 3 ribs [[celery]], chopped * 1 medium [[carrot]], grated * 1 8-ounce can crushed [[pineapple]] in juice * 1/2 cup [[Raisins]] * [[lettuce]] leaves * == Directions == Mix [[Mayonnaise]], juice and [[salt]] in large bowl. Add [[rice]], [[Tuna]], [[celery]], [[carrot]], [[pineapple]] and [[Raisins]] in large bowl. Toss lightly. Serve on [[lettuce]] leaves.
=== Other Links === == See also ==
[[Category:American Salads]] [[Category:Lettuce Recipes]] [[Category:Mayonnaise Recipes]] [[Category:Pineapple Recipes]] [[Category:Raisin Recipes]] [[Category:Rice Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Tuna Recipes]]

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description == Makes 6 servings.
=== Ingredients === * 3 cups cooked [[rice]], cooled * 1/2 cup finely chopped [[Onion]] * 1/2 cup chopped [[sweet pickles]] * 1 teaspoon [[salt]] * 1/4 teaspoon ground [[black pepper]] * 1 cup [[Mayonnaise]] * 1 teaspoon prepared [[mustard]] * 1 2-ounce jar [[pimiento]]s, diced (1/4 cup) * 4 hard-cooked [[egg]]s, chopped * [[lettuce]] leaves (optional) * == Directions == Blend [[rice]], [[Onion]], pickles, [[salt]], [[pepper]], [[Mayonnaise]], [[mustard]], pimientos and hard-cooked [[egg]]s thoroughly. Chill. Serve on [[lettuce]] leaves, if desired.
=== Other Links === == See also ==
[[Category:American Salads]] [[Category:Lettuce Recipes]] [[Category:Mayonnaise Recipes]] [[Category:Mustard seed Recipes]] [[Category:Rice Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]]

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description == Makes 6 servings.
=== Ingredients === * 3 cups cooked [[rice]], cooled * 3 hard-cooked [[egg]]s, chopped * 1/2 cup reduced-calorie [[Mayonnaise]] * 1/2 cup finely chopped [[green onions]] * 1/2 cup chopped [[sweet pickles]] * 1 (2-ounce) jar pimientos, diced (1/4 cup) * 1 teaspoon prepared [[mustard]] * 1/4 teaspoon ground [[black pepper]] * [[lettuce]] leaves * == Directions == Combine [[rice]], [[egg]]s, [[Mayonnaise]], [[onion]]s, pickles, pimientos, [[mustard]] and [[pepper]] in large bowl. Toss to thoroughly combine. Serve on [[lettuce]] leaves. === Other Links === == See also ==
[[Category:American Salads]] [[Category:Lettuce Recipes]] [[Category:Mayonnaise Recipes]] [[Category:Mustard seed Recipes]] [[Category:Rice Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]]

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description ==
[[Image:250888833.jpg|thumb|Coconut-Tuna Seviche]]
=== Ingredients ===
* 1 14-ounce can [[coconut milk]] * 1-inch piece of [[ginger]], peeled and grated * 1 tablespoon grated fresh [[horseradish]] * 12 ounces first-quality fresh [[Tuna]], cut into ½ inch dice * 1 [[tomato]], seeded and diced * [[salt]] to taste * ½ small [[red onion]], julienned * 2 scallions, julienned
== Directions ==
* Boil [[coconut milk]], [[ginger]] and horseradish in a saucepan for 25 minutes until reduced by one quarter. * Strain and cool liquid. * Toss with [[Tuna]] and [[tomato]]; season to taste with [[salt]].
== See also ==
[[Category:Coconut milk Recipes]] [[Category:Red onion Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Tuna Recipes]] [[Category:Venezuelan Recipes]] [[Category:Venezuelan Salads]]

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description ==
[[Image:1056024687.jpg|thumb| Colombian Salad]]
=== Ingredients ===
* 1 8-ounce package chicken
* 1/4 cup chopped tomatoess
* 1/4 cup ham
== Directions ==
* Cook [[soba]] noodles according to package directions. * Drain and rinse in colander. * Combine all dressing ingredients in a small bowl; whisk together. * Place drained noodles in a large bowl. * Add dressing, [[cilantro]] and [[sesame seed]]s; toss gently. * Add optional chopped vegetables and toss again.
== See also ==
[[Category:Colombian Recipes]] [[Category:Colombian Salads]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Sesame seed Recipes]] [[Category:Soba Recipes]]

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description ==
[[Image:930982925.jpg|thumb| COLOMBIAN TUNA SALAD]]
=== Ingredients ===
* [[Tuna]] * Diced [[Apple]], [[pineapple]], [[Raisins]], [[walnuts]] (or whatever fruits you care to add) SAUCE; * [[Mayonnaise]] * [[yogurt]] * 1 tbsp. [[lemon juice]]
== Directions == Equal parts of [[Mayonnaise]] and [[yogurt]].
== See also ==
[[Category:Apple Recipes]] [[Category:Colombian Recipes]] [[Category:Colombian Salads]] [[Category:Mayonnaise Recipes]] [[Category:Pineapple Recipes]] [[Category:Raisin Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Tuna Recipes]] [[Category:Walnut Recipes]]

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description == Makes 6 servings.
=== Ingredients === * 1 tablespoon [[vegetable oil]] * 1 pound boneless, skinless [[Chicken]] breasts, cut into 1/2-inch chunks * 4 medium [[carrot]]s, thinly sliced * 1 small [[Onion]], chopped * 1 1/2 cups [[chicken broth]] * 1 16-ounce package frozen [[corn]] * 1 teaspoon dried [[dill|dill weed]] * 1/4 teaspoon ground [[black pepper]] * 1 1/2 cups [[low-fat milk]] * 3 tablespoons [[flour|all-purpose flour]] * 6 cups hot cooked [[rice]] * Fresh chopped [[parsley]] * * == Directions == Heat [[oil]] in large skillet over medium-high heat until hot. Add [[Chicken]]; cook 5 to 6 minutes or until [[Chicken]] is brown, stirring occasionally. Add [[carrot]]s and [[Onion]], cook 3 to 4 minutes or until [[Onion]] and [[carrot]]s are crisp-tender, stirring occasionally. Add broth, [[corn]], [[dill]], and [[pepper]]; cook 4 to 5 minutes or until thoroughly heated, stirring occasionally. Reduce heat to medium; add [[milk]] and [[flour]], simmer 3 to 4 minutes. Remove from heat; serve over hot [[rice]], sprinkle with [[parsley]]. === Other Links === == See also ==
[[Category:American Salads]] [[Category:Chicken Recipes]] [[Category:Chicken stock and broth Recipes]] [[Category:Corn Recipes]] [[Category:Dill Recipes]] [[Category:Dill leaf Recipes]] [[Category:Low-fat milk Recipes]] [[Category:Rice Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]]

== Description ==
[[Image:771173390.jpg|thumb| Confetti Rice Salad]]
=== Ingredients ===
* 1 pkt Uncle Ben's Brand [[Chicken]] Flavor [[rice]] Pilaf * 2 qt [[water]] * 1 cup [[green onions]], sliced * 1/2 cup Pimentos, diced * 1/2 cup [[vinegar]] * 1/2 cup [[vegetable oil|salad oil]] * 1/2 cup [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]]
== Directions ==
1. Combine [[rice]], contents of seasoning packet and [[water]] in cooking pan.
2. Bring to a vigorous boil. Reduce heat, cover and simmer until [[water]] is absorbed, about 5 minutes.
3. Cool.
4. Add [[green onions|green onion]] and pimentos.
5. Combine [[vinegar]], [[vegetable oil|salad oil]] and [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]]. Stir into [[rice]] mixture.
6. Chill before serving.
== See also ==
[[Category:Chicken Recipes]] [[Category:Rice Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Shallot Recipes]] [[Category:Spanish Recipes]] [[Category:Spanish Salads]]

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} === Description === Serves 4 [[Image:403055817.jpg |thumb| Copenhagen Salad]]
=== Ingredients === * 6 ounces blue [[Cheese]] * ½ pound [[grapes]] * 4 ounces [[walnuts]] -- shelled * 11 ounces [[mandarin orange]]s * [[white wine]]
== Directions ==
Cut [[Cheese]] into ¾ inch cubes (easy if [[Cheese]] is well chilled). Mix with halved and seeded black [[grapes]], halved [[walnuts]] and [[mandarin orange]]s. Just before serving, sprinkle with a little [[white wine]] or some liqueur
=== See Also ===
=== Other Links ===
[[Category:Cheese Recipes]] [[Category:Danish Recipes]] [[Category:Danish Salads]] [[Category:Grape Recipes]] [[Category:Mandarin orange Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Walnut Recipes]] [[Category:White wine Recipes]]

[[File:Crackedwheatsalad.png|right|300px|link=]]{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description ==
Salad with beans
=== Ingredients ===
* 1 cup bulgher (cracked) [[Wheat]] * 1 small [[Onion]], grated * 3 [[scallions]], finely chopped * 2 small red ripe [[tomato]]es, peeled, seeded and chopped * 2 tbls chopped fresh [[mint]] leaves * 1 cups chopped [[parsley]] * [[salt]] and freshly ground [[black pepper]] * 1/2 cup fresh [[lemon juice]] * 1/2 cup [[olive oil]] * 12 [[black olive]]s
== Directions ==
Soak the [[Wheat]] in 1 quart cold [[water]] for 15 minutes or until soft. Place in a large sieve lined with cheesecloth and squeeze out the extra moisture. Put into a mixing bowl and add the [[Onion]], scallions, [[tomato]]es, [[mint]] leaves, [[parsley]], [[salt]] and [[pepper]] to taste. Blend thoroughly.
Mix the [[lemon juice]] and [[oil]]; pour over [[Wheat]] mixture and toss with fork. Correct the seasoning. Let stand 2 to 3 hours in a cool place (refrigerator) before serving. Garnish with when serving.
NOTE: For extra flavor, try soaking the bulgher [[Wheat]] in [[chicken broth]] and mix the sliced [[black olive]]s into the salad instead of using them as whole black olive garnishes.
=== Other Links ===
== See also == [[Category:Black olive Recipes]] [[Category:Chicken Recipes]] [[Category:Chicken stock and broth Recipes]] [[Category:Lebanese Salads]] [[Category:Mint Recipes]] [[Category:Recipes that need photos]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Wheat Recipes]]

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description == Makes 10 servings. === Ingredients === * 3 cups cooked [[rice]] * 1/2 cup sweetened dried [[cranberry|cranberries]] * 2 [[celery]] stalks, chopped * 1/2 cup salted [[cashews]] * 1/4 cup [[balsamic vinegar]] * * == Directions == In medium bowl, combine [[rice]], [[cranberry|cranberries]], [[celery]], cashews and [[vinegar]]; toss well. Serve cold.
=== Other Links === == See also ==
[[Category:American Salads]] [[Category:Balsamic vinegar Recipes]] [[Category:Cranberry Recipes]] [[Category:Dried cranberry Recipes]] [[Category:Rice Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Vegetarian Recipes]]

revision.comment: clean up, replaced: [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]] substitute → [[sugar substitute]] (2)
revision.text:
{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description == Makes 6 servings === Ingredients === * 3/4 cup packed fresh [[parsley]] leaves * 3 tablespoons frozen [[orange juice]] concentrate * 3/4 cup light cholesterol free, reduced calorie [[Mayonnaise]] * 1 1/2 cups fresh [[cranberry|cranberries]]* * 2 packets [[sugar substitute]] (optional) * 3 cups cooked [[rice]] * 2 cups cubed cooked [[Turkey]] * 1 cup sliced [[celery]] * 1/2 cup chopped [[pecans]], toasted (optional) * == Directions == Place knife blade in food processor; add [[parsley]], cover, and process until chopped. Add [[orange juice]] concentrate and [[Mayonnaise]]; process until blended. Transfer to large bowl; set aside.
Chop [[cranberry|cranberries]] in food processor. Sprinkle with [[sugar substitute]] if desired. Stir [[cranberry|cranberries]], [[rice]], [[Turkey]] and [[celery]] into [[Mayonnaise]] mixture; blend well. Cover and refrigerate at least 2 hours or until serving time. Stir in [[pecans]] just before serving.
=== Other Links === == See also ==
[[Category:American Salads]] [[Category:Cranberry Recipes]] [[Category:Mayonnaise Recipes]] [[Category:Orange juice Recipes]] [[Category:Pecan Recipes]] [[Category:Rice Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Turkey meat Recipes]]

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description == Makes 4 servings. === Ingredients === * 1 pound cooked [[Crawfish]] tails * 2 cups cooked [[rice]] * 1 cup sliced [[celery]] * 1/3 cup sliced [[black olive|ripe olives]] * 1/3 cup diced green [[bell pepper]] * 1/2 cup quartered [[cherry tomato]]es * 1/2 cup Italian dressing* * [[lettuce]] leaves * * == Directions == Combine [[Crawfish]], [[rice]], [[celery]], [[green bell pepper|green pepper]], [[tomato]]es and dressing in large bowl. Serve over [[lettuce]] leaves === Other Links === == See also ==
[[Category:American Salads]] [[Category:Black olive Recipes]] [[Category:Cherry tomato Recipes]] [[Category:Crayfish Recipes]] [[Category:Green bell pepper Recipes]] [[Category:Lettuce Recipes]] [[Category:Rice Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]]

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description == Makes 8 servings (6 cups). === Ingredients === * 3 cups cooked [[rice]], cooled * 1 12-ounce package [[frankfurters]], sliced * 1 1/2 cups sliced [[celery]] * 3/4 cup chopped [[Onion]] * 1/2 cup chopped pimientos * 1 11-ounce can condensed [[Cheddar]] [[Cheese]] soup * 1/4 cup [[Mayonnaise]] * 1 tablespoon prepared [[mustard]] * 1/4 teaspoon ground [[black pepper]] * 3 hard-cooked [[egg]]s, sliced * Salad greens (optional) * Sliced hard-cooked [[egg]]s for garnish (optional) * == Directions == Combine [[rice]], frankfurters, [[celery]], [[Onion]] and pimientos in large bowl.
Blend soup, [[Mayonnaise]], [[mustard]] and [[pepper]]; stir into [[rice]] mixture. Chill. Serve on salad greens, if desired; garnish with [[egg]] slices, if desired.
=== Other Links === == See also ==
[[Category:American Salads]] [[Category:Cheddar Recipes]] [[Category:Cheese Recipes]] [[Category:Frankfurter Recipes]] [[Category:Mayonnaise Recipes]] [[Category:Mustard seed Recipes]] [[Category:Rice Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]]

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description == Makes 6 servings. === Ingredients === * 1 [[Chicken]], cooked, skinned, boned and cut into small cubes * 3 cups cooked [[rice]] * 2 cans (11 ounces each) [[mandarin orange]]s, drained * 1/2 medium-size [[red onion]], sliced * 1 rib [[celery]], thinly sliced * 3/4 cup plain [[yogurt]] * 1/4 cup [[honey]] * 2 tablespoons [[lemon juice]] * 1 teaspoon [[curry]] powder * 1/4 teaspoon [[salt]] * 1/3 cup chopped dry roasted [[peanut]]s * == Directions == Combine [[Chicken]], [[rice]], [[oranges]], [[Onion]] and [[celery]] in large bowl; cover and refrigerate until chilled.
Combine [[yogurt]], honey, [[lemon juice]], [[curry]] and [[salt]] in small bowl; stir until well combined. Cover and refrigerate until chilled. To serve, pour dressing over salad; toss gently. Sprinkle with [[peanut]]s.
=== Other Links === == See also ==
[[Category:Chicken Recipes]] [[Category:Curry Recipes]] [[Category:Mandarin orange Recipes]] [[Category:Red onion Recipes]] [[Category:Rice Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Yogurt Recipes]]

== Description == Makes 6 servings. === Ingredients === * 3 cups cooked [[rice]], cooled * 2 medium [[carrot]]s, sliced * 1 cup diagonally sliced [[celery]] * 1 tart red [[Apple]], cored and coarsely chopped * 1/2 cup [[slivered almond]]s, toasted * 3/4 cup [[Mayonnaise]] * 1 tablespoon [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]] * 1 teaspoon [[lemon juice]] * 1/2 teaspoon [[salt]] * 1/8 teaspoon ground [[black pepper]] * == Directions == Combine [[rice]], [[carrot]]s, [[celery]], [[Apple]] and [[almond]]s in large bowl. Blend [[Mayonnaise]], [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]], [[lemon juice]], [[salt]] and [[pepper]]; toss with [[rice]] mixture. Serve at room temperature or chilled.
=== Other Links === == See also ==
[[Category:Almond Recipes]] [[Category:American Salads]] [[Category:Apple Recipes]] [[Category:Mayonnaise Recipes]] [[Category:Rice Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Vegetarian Recipes]]

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description == Makes 6 servings. === Ingredients === * 3 cups cooked [[rice]], cooled * 1 12-ounce can [[water]] packed [[Tuna]], drained and flaked * 2 medium [[carrot]]s, shredded * 1 medium-size green or red [[bell pepper]], chopped * 1 cup chopped [[jícama|jicama]]* * 3/4 cup thinly sliced [[green onions]] * 2 cups nonfat plain [[yogurt]] * 1 1/2 teaspoons [[lemon pepper]] * 1/4 teaspoon [[salt]] * 1/4 teaspoon ground [[black pepper]] * 3 Whole pita bread rounds, halved * Shredded [[lettuce]] * == Directions == Combine [[rice]], [[Tuna]], [[carrot]]s, [[bell pepper]], [[jícama|jicama]], and [[Onion]] in large bowl. Add [[yogurt]], [[lemon pepper]], [[salt]] and [[pepper]]. Toss to combine ingredients. Chill at least 1 hour. Serve in pita bread with [[lettuce]].
=== Other Links === == See also ==
[[Category:American Salads]] [[Category:Jícama Recipes]] [[Category:Lemon pepper Recipes]] [[Category:Lettuce Recipes]] [[Category:Rice Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Tuna Recipes]] [[Category:Yogurt Recipes]]

== Description == Serves 4 [[Image:231784555.jpg|thumb|Cucumbers in Sour Cream]]
== Ingredients == * ½ cup [[sour cream]] * 1 tablespoon [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]] * 1 tablespoon [[lemon juice]] * 1 teaspoon [[salt]] * 1 teaspoon [[sesame seed]]s -- optional * 1 dash [[pepper]] * 2 [[cucumber]]s -- sliced thin * 1 small [[Onion]] -- sliced
== Directions == Mix first six ingredients together and pour over the combined [[cucumber]] and [[Onion]] slices. Stir gently. Chill before serving.
== See also ==
== Other Links ==
[[Category:Cucumber Recipes]] [[Category:Danish Recipes]] [[Category:Danish Salads]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Sesame seed Recipes]]

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description == Makes 6 servings. === Ingredients === * 3 cups cooked [[rice]], cooled * 2 1/2 to 3 cups cooked [[Chicken]], cut into thin strips * 1 tart red [[Apple]], cored and chopped * 1/2 cup seedless [[Raisins]] * 1/2 cup sliced [[celery]] * 3/4 cup [[Mayonnaise]] * 1 teaspoon [[curry]] powder * 1/2 teaspoon [[salt]] * 1/2 teaspoon ground [[black pepper]] * [[lettuce]] leaves * * == Directions == Combine [[rice]], [[Chicken]], [[Apple]], [[Raisins]] and [[celery]] in large bowl.
Blend [[Mayonnaise]], [[curry]], [[salt]] and [[pepper]]; toss lightly with [[rice]] mixture. Chill. Serve on [[lettuce]] leaves.
=== Other Links === == See also ==
[[Category:American Salads]] [[Category:Apple Recipes]] [[Category:Chicken Recipes]] [[Category:Curry Recipes]] [[Category:Lettuce Recipes]] [[Category:Mayonnaise Recipes]] [[Category:Raisin Recipes]] [[Category:Rice Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]]

revision.comment: clean up, replaced: [[cayenne pepper|red pepper]] → red pepper (2)
revision.text:
{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description == Makes 6 servings === Ingredients === * 2 tablespoons [[white wine vinegar]] * 1 tablespoon [[lemon juice]] * 1 tablespoon [[vegetable oil]] * 2 teaspoons chopped fresh [[dill]]* * 1/2 teaspoon [[salt]] * 1/4 teaspoon ground [[black pepper]] * 3 cups cooked [[rice]], cooled * 1 medium-size red pepper, chopped * 1/2 pound snow [[Peas]], julienned * == Directions == Combine [[vinegar]], [[lemon juice]], [[oil]], [[dill]], [[salt]] and [[pepper]] in large bowl. Add [[rice]], red pepper and snow [[Peas]]; toss. Serve chilled === Other Links === == See also ==
[[Category:American Salads]] [[Category:Dill Recipes]] [[Category:Pea Recipes]] [[Category:Rice Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Vegetarian Recipes]] [[Category:White vinegar Recipes]]

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description == Makes 8 servings === Ingredients === * 3 cups cooked [[rice]] * 1 16-ounce can fancy mixed Chinese vegetables, drained * 1 15-1/2 ounce can [[salmon]] (drain; reserve liquid) * 1 cup thinly sliced [[celery]] * 1/2 [[green bell pepper|green pepper]], cut into thin strips * 1/2 cup finely chopped [[Onion]] * 1 cup [[Mayonnaise]] * 2 tablespoons [[soy sauce]] * 1/4 teaspoon ground [[black pepper]] * 1 3-ounce can [[chow mein noodles]] * [[lettuce]] leaves * [[tomato]] wedges for garnish (optional )
== Directions == # Combine [[rice]], Chinese vegetables, flaked salmon, [[celery]], [[green bell pepper|green pepper]] and [[Onion]] in large bowl. # Blend [[Mayonnaise]], soy sauce, 2 tablespoons salmon liquid and [[black pepper]]. # Pour over salmon mixture; toss lightly. Chill. # Just before serving, add noodles and toss again. # Serve on [[lettuce]] leaves; garnish with [[tomato]] wedges, if desired.
== See also ==
[[Category:Chinese Recipes]] [[Category:Chinese Salads]] [[Category:Chow mein noodle Recipes]] [[Category:Green bell pepper Recipes]] [[Category:Lettuce Recipes]] [[Category:Mayonnaise Recipes]] [[Category:Rice Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]]

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description == Makes 6 servings. === Ingredients === * 1/3 cup sliced [[green onions]] * 1 1/2 cups sliced [[celery]] * 1/3 cup sweet pickle relish * 3 cups cooked [[rice]] * 6 hard-cooked [[egg]]s, chopped * 1 cup [[Mayonnaise]] * [[salt]] and ground [[black pepper]] to taste * [[lettuce]] leaves
== Directions ==
# Combine [[onion]]s, [[celery]], relish, [[rice]], [[egg]]s, [[Mayonnaise]], [[salt]] and [[pepper]]. # Chill. # Fill custard cups or individual molds with salad mixture, pressing down firmly with spoon. # Unmold on [[lettuce]] leaves. # Garnish with [[black olive|ripe olives]] and [[tomato]] wedges, if desired.
== See also ==
[[Category:American Salads]] [[Category:Black olive Recipes]] [[Category:Lettuce Recipes]] [[Category:Mayonnaise Recipes]] [[Category:Rice Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]]

== Description ==
=== Ingredients === * Round [[lettuce]] - 1, * Sardines in [[olive oil]] - 1 x 120g (4 oz) can, * [[egg]]s - 2 large hard boiled, * [[celery]] - 1 large stick, * Soured [[cream]] - 150 ml (5 fl oz), * [[milk]] - 1 tbsp, * [[lemon juice]] or [[vinegar]] - 1 tbsp, * [[powdered sugar|icing sugar]] - *1 tsp, or [[superfine sugar|caster sugar]], * [[chives]] - 3 tbsp, snipped, * [[salt]] - * teaspoon, * [[pepper]] - dash, * [[paprika]] to garnish, * [[lemon]] wedges - 4, to garnish.
== Directions ==
# Wash the [[lettuce]] and shake the leaves dry. Tear into bite-sized pieces and use to cover 4 individual plates. # Skin and bone the sardines. Chop the [[egg]]s finely. # Wash the [[celery]] and slice thinly. # Put the sardines in a bowl and mash finely with the [[egg]]s. Add the [[celery]]. # Beat the soured [[cream]] well together with [[milk]] and [[lemon juice]] or [[vinegar]]. # Stir in [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]]. Add the [[chives]]. Season to taste with [[salt]] and [[pepper]]. # If a thinner dressing is preferred, add a little extra [[milk]]. # Leave in the fridge for 15 minutes before using. # Blend the dressing into the sardine mixture. # Pile equal amounts over the [[lettuce]]. # Sprinkle lightly with [[paprika]] and top each with a [[lemon]] wedge.
== See also ==
[[Category:British Recipes]] [[Category:British Salads]] [[Category:Chives Recipes]] [[Category:Lettuce Recipes]] [[Category:Recipes that need photos]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]]

== Description == Makes 6 servings. === Ingredients === * 3 cups cooked [[rice]], cooled * 1 small tart red [[Apple]], cored and chopped * 1/2 cup seedless green or [[Red grapes|Red Grapes]], halved * 1/2 cup chopped [[pecans]] * 1/2 cup chopped [[celery]] * 1/4 cup sliced [[green onions]] * 3/4 cup [[Mayonnaise]] * 1 tablespoon [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]] * 2 teaspoons [[lemon juice]] * 1/2 teaspoon [[salt]] * 1/2 teaspoon [[ginger|ground ginger]] * 1/4 teaspoon ground [[black pepper]] * [[lettuce]] leaves * [[grapes|grape]] clusters for garnish (optional)
== Directions ==
# Combine [[rice]], [[Apple]], [[grapes]], [[pecans]], [[celery]] and [[onion]]s in large bowl. # Blend [[Mayonnaise]], [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]], [[lemon juice]], [[salt]], [[ginger]] and [[pepper]]; # Toss with [[rice]] mixture. Chill. # Serve on [[lettuce]] leaves; garnish with [[grapes]], if desired.
== See also ==
[[Category:American Salads]] [[Category:Apple Recipes]] [[Category:Lettuce Recipes]] [[Category:Mayonnaise Recipes]] [[Category:Pecan Recipes]] [[Category:Red grape Recipes]] [[Category:Rice Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]]

== Description ==
[[Image:403029391.jpg|thumb|Endive or Spinach Salad]]
=== Ingredients ===
* 1 quart [[Endive]] or [[spinach]] * 3 hard-boiled [[egg]]s * 4 slices [[Bacon]] * 1/2 cup [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]] * 2 tablespoons [[flour]] * 1 [[egg]], beaten * 1 teaspoon [[salt]] * 1/2 cup [[vinegar]] * 1 1/2 cups [[water]]
== Directions ==
* Top with sliced [[egg]]s. * Cover with hot [[Bacon]] dressing and serve. * Brown [[Bacon]], remove from drippings and crumble. * Combine [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]] and [[flour]]. * Add [[egg]], [[salt]], [[vinegar]] and [[water]] and mix . * Pour into [[Bacon]] drippings and heat stirring constantly. * Add crumbled [[Bacon]].
== See also ==
[[Category:Amish Salads]] [[Category:Bacon Recipes]] [[Category:Endive Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Spinach Recipes]]

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} [[File:Winter-endive-salad-1.jpg|right|250px|link]] == Description == Serves 4-6.
=== Ingredients === * [[oranges]] - 4 large, * Head of [[Endive]] - 1 torn into small pieces, * Watercress - 1 bunch torn into sprigs, * red pepper - 1 small seeded and cut into thin rings, * Natural [[yogurt]] - 150g (5oz), * [[hazelnuts]] - 25g (1oz).
== Directions == 1. Remove all of the peel and white pith from 3 of the [[oranges]], then segment them. Mix the [[orange]] segments with the [[Endive]], watercress and red pepper in a large salad bowl.
2. Finely zest the remaining [[orange]] and add to a bowl. Squeeze in the juice. Whisk in the [[yogurt]] and season to taste.
3. Spread the [[hazelnuts]] out on a baking sheet and toast lightly under a hot grill. Turn the [[nuts]] on to a clean tea-towel and rub off the loose skins. Roughly chop.
4. Just before serving, drizzle the dressing over the salad and sprinkle with the [[nuts]]. Serve immediately.
=== Other Links ===
== See also == [[Category:British Recipes]] [[Category:British Salads]] [[Category:Endive Recipes]] [[Category:Hazelnut Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Yogurt Recipes]]

page.title: Fall Harvest Salad in a Tortilla

revision.text:
{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description == [[Image:Fall Harvest Salad in a Tortilla.jpg|thumb|Fall Harvest Salad in a Tortilla]] === Ingredients === * 2 Mission? Fat Free Burrito Size [[flour]] Tortillas * 4 Tbsp. [[Mayonnaise]] Dressing or light [[Mayonnaise]] * 1/2 cup [[zucchini]] and [[zucchini|yellow squash]] diced * 1/4 cup Green or Yellow [[bell pepper]]s diced * 1 medium [[tomato]] seeded and diced * 1/2 cup shredded [[Cheddar]] [[Cheese]] (2 oz.) * 2 cups Packaged Salad Mix * 2 Tbsp. fat free Italian Dressing == Directions == * Spread each tortilla with 2 tablespoons of [[Mayonnaise]]. * In a medium bowl, combine remaining ingredients and toss together. * Divide salad evenly among the tortillas. * To serve, roll up burrito style and slice in half. === Other Links === == See also ==
[[Category:Cheddar Recipes]] [[Category:Cheese Recipes]] [[Category:Mayonnaise Recipes]] [[Category:Mexican Recipes]] [[Category:Mexican Salads]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Squash Recipes]] [[Category:Zucchini Recipes]]

== Description ==
Lebanese Salad
=== Ingredients ===
* 2 tspn minced [[garlic]] * 1 tspn [[salt]] * 1 tspn [[pepper]] * 1/2 cup chopped [[mint]] * 1/2 cup [[lemon]] juice * 3/4 cup olive [[oil]] * 1 loaf [[flatbread]] * 6 leaves romaine [[lettuce]], torn into 1 inch pieces * 1 diced [[cucumber]] * 2 diced [[tomato]]es * 1/2 cup sliced [[green onions]] * 1/2 cup diced [[bell pepper]] * 1/2 cup [[Chickpeas]]
== Directions ==
In a small bowl, combine the [[garlic]], [[salt]], [[pepper]], [[mint]], [[lemon]] juice, and olive [[oil]]. Let stand for 1/2 hour. Toast the bread in an oven at 350 degrees for 5 minutes, or until it is golden brown and crispy. Break the toasted bread into 1 inch pieces. In a large bowl, combine the bread, romaine [[lettuce]], [[cucumber]], [[tomato]]es, [[green onions]], [[bell pepper]], and [[Chickpeas]]. Drizzle the dressing mixture over the salad, toss it together, and serve at once.
=== Other Links ===
== See also ==
[[Category:Chickpea Recipes]] [[Category:Cucumber Recipes]] [[Category:Lebanese Recipes]] [[Category:Lebanese Salads]] [[Category:Lettuce Recipes]] [[Category:Mint Recipes]] [[Category:Recipes that need photos]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]]

== Description ==
[[Image:205044391.jpg|thumb| Field Greens with Sage-Pinon Vinaigrette]]
=== Ingredients === * 1/4 cup [[pine nut]]s * 1/4 cup [[olive oil]] * 2 tbl chopped fresh [[sage]] leaves * 2 tbl [[balsamic vinegar]] * 1 x [[garlic]] clove minced * 3 qt mixed tender salad leaves - (abt 10 oz) rinsed, crisped * [[salt]] to taste * Freshly-ground [[black pepper]] to taste
== Directions == * In a 6- to 8-inch frying pan over medium heat, stir [[nuts]] until golden, about 4 minutes. * Pour from pan and coarsely chop half the [[nuts]]. * In a blender, whirl chopped [[nuts]], [[oil]], [[sage]], [[vinegar]], and [[garlic]] until smooth. * In a large bowl,mix salad leaves with dressing to coat well, then add remaining [[nuts]]. * Season to taste with [[salt]] and [[pepper]].
== See also ==
[[Category:Balsamic vinegar Recipes]] [[Category:Clove Recipes]] [[Category:Native American Salads]] [[Category:Pine nut Recipes]] [[Category:Sage Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]]

== Description ==
[[Image:538669614.jpg|thumb| Finnish Cucumber Salad]]
=== Ingredients === * 5 sm [[cucumber]]s -- peeled and Sliced * [[salt]] * 4 tbl Dill—chopped * 1 x [[garlic]] clove -- crushed * 1 cup [[sour cream]] * ds [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]] * 2 tbl Fresh [[tomato]] paste * 2 tbl [[wine vinegar]] * 1/4 cup [[olive oil]] * Fresh ground [[pepper]]
== Directions == Sprinkle some [[salt]] over the sliced [[cucumber]]s, leave for half an hour. Use a strainer to strain out the liquid. Remove the sliced [[cucumber]]s into a bowl. Mix [[cream]], dill, [[garlic]], [[pepper]] and [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]]. Add the [[tomato]] paste, [[vinegar]] and [[oil]] while mixing. Pour the dressing over the [[cucumber]]s and chill well.
=== Other Links ===
== See also ==
[[Category:Clove Recipes]] [[Category:Cucumber Recipes]] [[Category:Cucumber Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Finnish Recipes]] [[Category:Finnish Salads]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Wine vinegar Recipes]]

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description ==
[[Image:1428258828.jpg|thumb| Fish Salad]]
=== Ingredients ===
* 2 lb [[Halibut]] or cod fillet, cold boiled * 4 tbl [[Horseradish root]], freshly grated * 4 tbl Prepared [[horseradish]] * 1 pt [[sour cream]] * 1 tsp [[salt]] * 1/8 tsp [[white pepper]] * 2 tbl [[Onion]], finely chopped * 1 tsp [[white vinegar]] * 3 tbl Dill, fresh, finely chopped * 1 med [[iceberg lettuce|head lettuce]] * 2 x [[egg]]s, hard-cooked, sliced * 3 x [[tomato]]es
== Directions ==
* Prepared horseradish, squeeze it dry through a kitchen towel. * Combine the horseradish, [[sour cream]], [[salt]], [[pepper]], [[onion]]s, [[vinegar]] and 2 tablespoons of the chopped dill. * Break the fish into 2" chunks and fold it into the sour-[[cream]] . * Marinate for 30 minutes in the refrigerator. * Then arrange the fish, sauce and all, on a bed of dried, chilled [[lettuce]] leaves. * Garnish with the sliced [[egg]]s and [[tomato]] wedges, strew the remaining tablespoon of chopped dill over the salad.
== See also ==
[[Category:Cod Recipes]] [[Category:Halibut Recipes]] [[Category:Iceberg lettuce Recipes]] [[Category:Lettuce Recipes]] [[Category:Lettuce Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Norwegian Recipes]] [[Category:Norwegian Salads]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:White pepper Recipes]]

== Description == Five types of [[tomato]]es dressed with a vinegar-oil-herb-and-[[mustard]] dressing. * Makes 6 servings
== Ingredients == === Dressing === * 2 tablespoons [[olive oil]] or [[vegetable oil|salad oil]] * 2 tablespoons [[white wine vinegar]] * 1 tablespoon thinly sliced [[green onions|green onion]] or snipped fresh [[chives]] * 2 teaspoons snipped fresh [[basil]] or ½ teaspoon dried [[basil]], crushed * 1 teaspoon [[granulated sugar|sugar]] * ½ teaspoon [[Dijon-style mustard]] * ¼ teaspoon [[salt]]
=== Salad === * [[spinach]] leaves * 3 [[Roma tomato]]es, sliced * 2 medium red [[tomato]]es, sliced * 1 medium yellow [[tomato]], sliced * ½ cup red [[cherry tomato]]es, halved * ½ cup yellow [[cherry tomato]]es, halved * ½ cup crumbled [[feta]], [[gorgonzola]], or [[blue cheese]] (2 ounces) * freshly ground [[black pepper]]
== Directions == === Dressing === # For dressing, combine the olive or [[vegetable oil|salad oil]], [[vinegar]], [[green onions|green onion]] or [[chives]], [[basil]], [[granulated sugar|sugar]], [[mustard]], and [[salt]] in a screw-top jar. # Cover and shake well. # Chill, if desired.
=== Salad === # To serve, line a serving platter with [[spinach]] leaves. # Arrange [[tomato]]es on platter. # Shake dressing well; drizzle over [[tomato]]es. # Sprinkle crumbled [[cheese]] on top of [[tomato]]es. # Sprinkle with [[pepper]].
== Nutritional Info == * Calories 100 | total fat 7g | saturated fat 2g | cholesterol 8 mg | sodium 237 mg | carbohydrate 8g | fiber 2g | protein 3g | vitamin A 17% | vitamin C 42% | calcium 7% | iron 7%
__NOTOC__ [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Basil Recipes]] [[Category:Tomato Recipes]] [[Category:Cherry tomato Recipes]] [[Category:Plum tomato Recipes]] [[Category:Chives Recipes]] [[Category:Feta Recipes]] [[Category:Gorgonzola Recipes]] [[Category:Blue cheese Recipes]] [[Category:Dijon mustard Recipes]] [[Category:Spinach Recipes]] [[Category:White wine vinegar Recipes]]

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description == A great fruit base [[Mayonnaise]] with endless possibilities........
=== Ingredients === * 1/2 cup [[Mayonnaise]] * 1 tablespoon [[vinegar]] * 1/4 cup [[grape jelly]]
== Directions == # Beat [[Mayonnaise]] with jelly and [[vinegar]] until well blended. # Combine with any prepared fruit of your choice. # Serve in [[lettuce]] cups.
== See also ==
[[Category:Grape jelly Recipes]] [[Category:Lettuce Recipes]] [[Category:Mayonnaise Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Tahitian Recipes]] [[Category:Tahitian Salads]]

== Description ==
[[Image:1452279986.jpg|thumb|Garbanzo]]
=== Ingredients ===
* 1 lb sprouted [[garbanzo beans]] * [[salt]] to taste * 1 lb boiling [[potato]]es, such as Yukon Gold * 2 tbl [[olive oil]] * 2 tsp dark [[sesame oil]] * 6 tbl [[lemon juice]] * Freshly-ground [[black pepper]] to taste * 1/2 cup chopped [[cilantro]] * 1/4 cup chopped [[Italian parsley]] * 2 x [[garlic]] cloves minced
== Directions ==
Simmer the garbanzos in about a quart of salted [[water]] for 15 to 20 minutes, then taste one. They should be tender but firm, not mushy. In another pot, cover the [[potato]]es with cold, well-salted [[water]], bring to a boil and cook until the [[potato]]es can be easily pierced with a fork - the time will vary with the size of the [[potato]]es. Drain the [[potato]]es and allow them to cool completely. Drain the garbanzos and rub them lightly between your hands in a bowl of cool [[water]]. Loose skins will come off and float to the top, where you can skim them off. You may have to squeeze the beans a bit to separate them from the skins. Drain again, and combine the beans with the [[olive oil]], [[sesame oil]], [[lemon juice]], [[pepper]] to taste, [[cilantro]], [[parsley]] and [[garlic]]. Stir well, and leave the beans to marinate. When the [[potato]]es are completely cool, peel them and dice them to the size of the garbanzos. [[salt]] the diced [[potato]]es, wait a few minutes, then stir them into the marinated beans. Taste and adjust the seasoning with more [[salt]] or [[pepper]] as needed.
== See also == [[Category:Italian parsley Recipes]] [[Category:Potato Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Sesame oil Recipes]] [[Category:Spanish Recipes]] [[Category:Spanish Salads]]

== Description == Makes 6 servings.
=== Ingredients === * 1 1/2 pounds medium [[Shrimp]], grilled or sauteed* * 1 16-ounce jar chunky [[salsa]] * 3 cups cooked [[rice]], cooked in [[chicken broth]] * 2 medium [[cucumber]]s, seeded and finely chopped * 1 medium-size green [[bell pepper]], finely chopped * 1 cup thinly sliced [[green onions]] * 2 tablespoons [[lime juice]] * 2 cloves [[garlic]], minced * Bibb or [[leaf lettuce]] * * * * * * * == Directions == Reserve 12 [[Shrimp]] for garnish; set aside.
Coarsely chop remaining [[Shrimp]]. Combine [[Shrimp]], salsa, [[rice]], [[cucumber]], [[bell pepper]], [[onion]]s, [[lime juice]] and [[garlic]]. Chill 1 to 2 hours.
Line one quarter of stemmed glass or individual serving plate with [[lettuce]]. Place 1-1/2 cups salad in each glass or on plate. Garnish each serving with 2 whole [[Shrimp]].
=== Other Links === == See also ==
[[Category:Chicken stock and broth Recipes]] [[Category:Cucumber Recipes]] [[Category:Leaf lettuce Recipes]] [[Category:Lettuce Recipes]] [[Category:Lime juice Recipes]] [[Category:Rice Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]]

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description == Makes 8 servings
=== Ingredients === * 4 1/2 cups hot cooked [[rice]] (cooked in [[chicken broth]]) * 1/4 cup [[vegetable oil]] * 2 tablespoons [[vinegar]] * 1 teaspoon [[salt]] * 1/8 teaspoon ground [[black pepper]] * 1/2 cup [[Mayonnaise]] * 2 tablespoons prepared [[mustard]] * 1 1/2 cups sliced [[celery]] * 1 cup sliced [[black olive|ripe olives]] * 1 small [[Onion]], minced * 1/4 cup chopped [[dill pickles]] * 1/4 cup chopped [[pimiento]]s * 2 hard-cooked [[egg]]s, diced * * == Directions == Place [[rice]] in large bowl. Blend [[oil]], [[vinegar]], [[salt]] and [[pepper]] in small bowl; pour over hot [[rice]]. Mix well; set aside to cool.
Combine [[Mayonnaise]] and [[mustard]]; stir into [[rice]] mixture. Add [[celery]], [[Onion]], pickles and pimientos; mix well. Gently stir in [[egg]]s, Serve chilled.
=== Other Links === == See also ==
[[Category:American Salads]] [[Category:Black olive Recipes]] [[Category:Chicken stock and broth Recipes]] [[Category:Mayonnaise Recipes]] [[Category:Mustard seed Recipes]] [[Category:Pilaf Recipes]] [[Category:Rice Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]]

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description == Special diet to keep healthy
Generally persons with heart ailments are advised by doctors to avoid any fatty substances as they are likely to cause further damage to the heart. Hence this preparation is best suited for such persons. Moreover, persons who are on a dieting spree can have this salad without any hesitatio
[[Image:05redbeans01.jpg|thumb|Gram Sprout - Pomegranate Salad]]
=== Ingredients === * [[mung bean|green gram]] -1 cup * [[pomegranate seeds]] - ¾ cup * [[cucumber]] (small sized) - 1 no. * [[carrot]] (small sized) - 1 no. * [[mint]] Leaves - few * [[cilantro|coriander leaves]] - few * [[salt]] to taste. * [[lemon juice]] - 1 tbsp.
== Directions ==
Soak [[mung bean|green gram]] overnight and drain the excess [[water]] the next morning. After draining transfer it to a casserole and leave for a day to allow the [[mung bean|green gram]] to sprout. Keep tossing it once in a while. Peel the [[cucumber]] and [[carrot]]. Chop the [[cucumber]] finely and grate the [[carrot]]. Drop all the ingredients, namely sprouts, chopped [[cucumber]], grated [[carrot]], [[mint]] and [[cilantro|coriander leaves]], [[lime juice]], [[pomegranate seeds]] and [[salt]], in a broad container and mix well & serve.
=== Other Links ===
== See also ==
[[Category:Cucumber Recipes]] [[Category:Lime juice Recipes]] [[Category:Mint Recipes]] [[Category:Mung bean Recipes]] [[Category:Pomegranate Recipes]] [[Category:Pomegranate seed Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Singaporean Recipes]] [[Category:Singaporean Salads]]

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description == [[Image:Green Beans Salad.jpg|thumb|Green Beans Salad]] Serves: 3-4 Preparation time: 10–15 minutes === Ingredients ===
* 1/2 lb fresh [[green bean]]s, cut into small pieces * 1 [[Onion]], chopped * 4-5 [[green chilies]], slit * 2 tbsp [[lemon juice]] * 4 tbsp [[coconut]], grated (optional) * [[salt]] to taste * 1 tbsp [[oil]]
== Directions ==
# Fry the beans with very little [[oil]] until tender or microwave the beans first & then fry. # Remove from heat and add [[onion]]s, green chilies, [[salt]], [[grated coconut]] & [[lemon juice]]. # Serve immediately or chilled.

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description ==
(6 servings) [[Image:beananglia.jpg|right|Green Beans]]
=== Ingredients === * 1 cn (1 lb) cut [[green beans]], drained * 1 cn (1 lb) cut [[wax bean]]s, drained * 1 c Diced [[celery]] * 1 ts [[dill]]weed * 1/2 c Bottled creamy [[Onion]] dressng * 1/4 c [[slivered almond]]s (optional) * 1/2 c Salad [[croutons]]
== Directions == # Mix drained beans, [[celery]] and dill, and chill. # Just before serving add [[nuts]], croutons and dressing.

== Description ==
Another beloved family recipe.
[[Image:Gurkensalat.jpg|thumb|Gurkensalat]]
=== Ingredients ===
* 2 medium [[cucumber]]s * 1/8 teaspoon [[pepper]] * 1 1/2 tablespoons [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]] * 1/2 cup [[sour cream]] * 1/2 tablespoon [[cider vinegar]] * 1 tablespoon [[parsley]], fresh,minced * 1/2 teaspoon [[salt]]
== Directions ==
# Slice [[cucumber]]s paper-thin. # Sprinkle slices with [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]], [[vinegar]], [[salt]] and [[pepper]]. # Marinate for 20 minutes, drain off liquid, and toss lightly with [[sour cream]]. # Top with minced [[parsley]].

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description ==
=== Ingredients ===
* 2 cups smoked [[Ham]], cubed cooked * 8 ounces [[pineapple]] chunks * 2 [[celery]] ribs, sliced * 1/2 cup [[black olive]]s, halved * 1/4 cup [[Mayonnaise]] * 1 tablespoon [[lemon juice]] * 1/4 cup [[peanut]]s
== Directions ==
Combine [[Ham]], [[pineapple]], [[celery]], and . Mix. [[Mayonnaise]] and [[lemon juice]]; stir into [[Ham]] mix. Chill at least an hour. Stir in [[peanut]]s before serving.

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description ==
[[Image:Hawaiian Chicken Salad.jpg|thumb|Hawaiian Chicken Salad]]
=== Ingredients ===
* 2 1/2 cups cooked chickens, cut into 1/2-inch pieces * 1 (14 ounces) can [[pineapple]] chunks, drained * 1 cup [[celery]], cut into 1/2 inch squares * 3 tablespoons [[vegetable oil|salad oil]] * 2 tablespoons [[lemon juice]] * 1/4 teaspoon [[salt]] * 5 tablespoons [[Mayonnaise]] * 1/4 cup [[slivered almond]]s
== Directions ==
Combine [[Chicken]], [[pineapple]] and [[celery]]. Add [[vegetable oil|salad oil]], [[lemon juice]] and [[salt]]. Mix well. Marinate salad for 1 hour. Add [[Mayonnaise]] and mix well. Serve on a bed of [[lettuce]] and sprinkle [[almond]]s over top.

revision.text:
== Description ==
[[Image:Hawaiian Rice Salad.jpg|thumb|Hawaiian Rice Salad]]
=== Ingredients ===
* 1 cup long [[cereals|grain]] [[rice]] * 2 cups [[vegetable stock]] * 1/2 teaspoon [[turmeric]] powder * 3/4 cup [[pineapple]] chunks * 1/2 cup mangoes, chunks * 1/4 cup [[walnuts]], coarsely crushed * 1/3 cup [[Raisins]] * 1/2 cup [[cucumber]]s, chopped * 1/2 stalk [[celery]], chopped
For the dressing * 4 tablespoons [[lemon juice]] * 3 tablespoons honey * 2 tablespoons [[pineapple juice]] * 1 clove [[garlic]] * [[salt]], crushed * [[pepper]], crushed
== Directions ==
Wash [[rice]] thoroughly. In a pan, bring stock and [[turmeric]] powder to a boil. Add [[rice]]. Simmer until [[rice]] is cooked. Drain, rinse and spread [[rice]] on a tray to cool. Whisk dressing ingredients together in a bowl. Taste and adjust seasoning. In a bowl, mix [[rice]] with [[pineapple]], [[mango]], [[walnuts]], [[Raisins]], [[cucumber]] and [[celery]]. Gently fold in the dressing. Serve.
=== Other Links ===
== See also ==
[[Category:Cereals Recipes]] [[Category:Cucumber Recipes]] [[Category:Hawaiian Salads]] [[Category:Mango Recipes]] [[Category:Pineapple Recipes]] [[Category:Pineapple juice Recipes]] [[Category:Raisin Recipes]] [[Category:Rice Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]]

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description == Makes 8 servings
=== Ingredients === * 10 ounces cooked [[Ham]], cut into thin strips (2 cups) * 3 cups cooked [[rice]], cooled * 1 16-ounce can sliced [[peach]]es, drained * 1 1/2 cups sliced [[celery]] * 1/2 cup chutney, chopped * 1 teaspoon [[curry]] powder * 1 teaspoon seasoned [[pepper]] * 1/2 cup [[sour cream]] * 1/4 cup [[Mayonnaise]] * 1/2 cup [[almond#Sliced almonds|sliced almonds]], toasted * == Directions ==
Combine [[Ham]], [[rice]], [[peach]]es, [[celery]], chutney, [[curry]], [[pepper]], [[sour cream]] and [[Mayonnaise]]. Toss lightly. Serve on salad greens, if desired. Sprinkle with [[almond]]s.
=== Other Links === == See also ==
[[Category:Almond Recipes]] [[Category:American Salads]] [[Category:Curry Recipes]] [[Category:Ham Recipes]] [[Category:Mayonnaise Recipes]] [[Category:Peach Recipes]] [[Category:Rice Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]]

== Description == Serves 8 [[Image:274929257.jpg|thumb| Herring Salad]]
== Ingredients == * 3 [[Herring]] * 3 cups [[potato]]es -- boiled & diced * 2½ cups [[Veal]] -- cooked & cut up * 1 large dill pickle—bite-size pieces * 2½ cups tart [[Apple]]s -- diced * 2½ cups [[beets]]—cooked and diced * [[salt]] * [[pepper]] * 2 tablespoons minced [[onion]]s * 1 cup [[carrot]]s -- cooked and diced * 6 tablespoons [[vinegar]] * 1 tablespoon [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]] * 1 cup [[light whipping cream|whipping cream]] * 2 hard-boiled [[egg]]s -- sliced * 1 hard-boiled [[egg]] -- minced * [[parsley]] == Directions == Wash [[Herring]]. Cover with cold [[water]] and soak overnight. Skin and bone, using only the fillets. Dry and cut into small chunks. Prepare the salad 4 hours before serving.
Mix [[potato]]es, fish, [[Veal]], pickle, [[Apple]]s and beets (reserve about ¼ of the beets for garnishing). Add [[salt]] and [[pepper]] to taste. Add [[Onion]] and [[carrot]]s and toss with a fork until lightly mixed.
Mix [[vinegar]] and [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]] and pour over the salad.
Whip ½ of the [[cream]] and fold into the salad, mixing gently. Whip the rest of the [[cream]] and top the salad, mixing gently. Whip the rest of the [[cream]] and top the salad with it just as you are ready to serve.
Pack into a salad bowl. Chill 4 hours. Unmold on a chilled serving platter. Slice the 2 hard-boiled [[egg]]s over it. Garnish with remaining beets. Spread over the beets the minced hard-boiled [[egg]]. Decorate with sprigs of [[parsley]].
Wonderful dish for a smørgåsbord.
== See also ==
== Other Links ==
[[Category:Apple Recipes]] [[Category:Danish Recipes]] [[Category:Danish Salads]] [[Category:Herring Recipes]] [[Category:Light whipping cream Recipes]] [[Category:Potato Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Veal Recipes]]

== Description ==
[[Image:veg ho.jpg|thumb|Hobak namul (Squash salad)]]
=== Ingredients === * 1/2 [[Squash]] or about 6 oz * 1/4 cup [[water]], 1 teaspoon [[sesame oil]] * 1/2 teaspoon minced [[garlic]] * 1/2 teaspoon [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]], 1/4 teaspoon [[salt]] * 1/4 teaspoon [[soy sauce]] * 1/4 teaspoon [[sesame seed]]s for garnish
== Directions == Quarter the [[Squash]] in length wise, slice in 1/4 inch thick.
In a small pan, add all ingredients and mix. Put [[Squash]], cover the lid. Bring to a boil on a medium high heat, reduce to low heat, cook for another minute or so. Transfer to a dish, garnish with [[sesame seed]]s.
=== Other Links ===
== See also ==
[[Category:Korean Recipes]] [[Category:Korean Salads]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Sesame oil Recipes]] [[Category:Sesame seed Recipes]] [[Category:Squash Recipes]]

== Description ==
[[Image:337469254.jpg|thumb|Homemade Salad Dressing]]
=== Ingredients ===
* 3/4 cup [[oil]] * 1 [[egg]] * 1 1/2 teaspoons prepared [[mustard]] * 2 teaspoons [[salt]] * 1/3 cup [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]] * 1/2 cup [[flour]], plus * 2 1/2 tablespoons [[flour]] * 1 1/3 cups [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]] * 1/3 cup [[vinegar]] * 1 cup [[water]]
== Directions ==
* Mix the [[oil]], [[egg]], [[mustard]], [[salt]] and 1/3 cup [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]]. * Set aside. * Over low heat blend [[flour]], 1/3 cup [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]], [[vinegar]] and [[water]]. * Bring to boil, stirring constantly . * Combine well with first mixture
== See also ==
[[Category:Amish Salads]] [[Category:Mustard seed Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]]

page.title: Jan Bilton's South of the Border Salad

revision.text:
{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description == 4 servings. [[Image:1360405749.jpg|thumb|Jan Bilton's South of the Border Salad]]
=== Ingredients === * 2 small avocados * 4 [[tomato|vine-ripened tomatoes]] * 1 cup peeled, seeded and diced [[cantaloupe|rockmelon]] * 2 tbsp each - chopped [[chives]], [[basil]] * 1 tbsp [[lemon juice]] [[lemon]] dressing * 3 tbsp [[lemon juice]] * 2 tbsp Olivado Extra Virgin [[avocado oil]] * freshly ground [[salt]] and [[pepper]] to taste
== Directions == Halve the avocados, stone peel and cut each half in half again. Quarter the [[tomato]]es and combine with the other salad ingredients. Just before serving, sprinkle with the combined dressing ingredients.
=== Other Links ===
== See also ==
[[Category:Basil Recipes]] [[Category:Cantaloupe Recipes]] [[Category:Chives Recipes]] [[Category:New Zealand Recipes]] [[Category:New Zealand Salads]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]]

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description ==
[[Image:22kachumber01.jpg|thumb|Kachumber]]
=== Ingredients === * 3 medium [[onion]]s * 2 medium [[tomato]]es * 3 sprigs [[coriander]] * 4 tbs. of [[lime juice]] * 2 [[green chillies]] * 1 tsp. of [[salt]] * ¼ tsp. of [[pepper]]
== Directions ==
Wash the [[tomato]]es, [[cilantro|coriander leaves]] and chillies thoroughly. Peel and slice the [[onion]]s.
Cut the [[tomato]]es into thin slices.
Chop the coriander and chillies. Mix with [[tomato]]es and [[onion]]s.
Add [[salt]], [[pepper]] and [[lime juice]], and toss well.
=== Other Links ===
== See also ==
[[Category:Lime Recipes]] [[Category:Lime juice Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Singaporean Recipes]] [[Category:Singaporean Salads]]

== Description ==
[[water spinach|kangkong]] (Tagalog) is called [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Watercress Watercress] in English, sometimes as [[water spinach|swamp cabbage]] or [[water spinach]] although it's not really [[cabbage]] or [[spinach]]. It's sort of ubiquituous in the Philippines, it grows everywhere, in ditches, in ponds, on dry land, or in cultivation.
=== Ingredients ===
* 1/2 kilo [[water spinach|kangkong]] (blanched and drained well) * 4 [[tomato]]es (sliced into rings) * 2 medium [[red onion]]s (sliced into rings) * 4 hard-boiled [[egg]]s (sliced into rings) * 2 medium [[potato]]es (peeled, boiled and cubed) * 2 cups [[vinegar]] * 1 small head of [[garlic]] (finely minced) * 1/2 teaspoon [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]] * 1/4 teaspoon [[salt]] * 1 teaspoon [[black pepper]] (freshly grounded)
== Directions ==
1. In a big wooden or crystal, arrange [[water spinach|kangkong]].
2. Top with sliced [[tomato]]es, [[onion]]s, [[potato]]es and cubed [[potato]]es.
3. In another bowl, combine [[vinegar]], minced [[garlic]], [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]] [[salt]] and black [[pepper]].
4. Serve [[water spinach|kangkong]] with [[vinegar]] dressing.
=== Other Links ===
== See also == [[Category:Cabbage Recipes]] [[Category:Filipino Recipes]] [[Category:Filipino Salads]] [[Category:Heart of palm Recipes]] [[Category:Potato Recipes]] [[Category:Recipes that need photos]] [[Category:Red onion Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Spinach Recipes]]

== Description == "This is a recipe that a Korean Friend of mine gave to me. I like it, except for all the [[ginger]]!" Original recipe yield: 8 servings.
=== Ingredients === * 2 pounds coarsely chopped [[bok choy|Chinese cabbage]] * 1 tablespoon [[salt]] * 2 tablespoons chopped [[green onions|green onion]] * 1 clove [[garlic]], crushed * 1 tablespoon [[chili powder]] * 2 teaspoons minced [[ginger|fresh ginger]] root * 1/2 cup light [[soy sauce]] * 1/2 cup [[white wine vinegar]] * 2 teaspoons [[granulated sugar|white sugar]] * 1 dash [[sesame oil]]
== Directions == 1 - dash [[cabbage]] with [[salt]], let sit for approx 4 hours
2 - Drain liquids out of [[cabbage]] and add the [[garlic]], [[onion]]s, [[chili powder]]. [[vinegar]], soy sauce, and [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]]. Add [[sesame oil]] before serving.
=== Other Links ===
== See also ==
[[Category:Cabbage Recipes]] [[Category:Chili powder Recipes]] [[Category:Chinese Recipes]] [[Category:Chinese Salads]] [[Category:Clove Recipes]] [[Category:Recipes that need photos]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Sesame oil Recipes]] [[Category:Shallot Recipes]]

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description ==
A wonderful combination of flavors that really compliment each other. Great for cook-outs. Never a morsel left.
=== Ingredients ===
* 1 (20 ounces) can [[pineapple]] chunks * 1 cup [[Mayonnaise]] * 1/2 teaspoon dry [[mustard]] * 2 cups [[Ham]], strips "or: chunks * 1 cup [[celery]], slices * 2 cups [[strawberries]], halves * 2 large [[bananas]], sliced
== Directions ==
Drain [[pineapple]], reserving 2 Tbls. Syrup. Combine [[mayonnaise|mayo]], [[mustard]] and reserved syrup; mix well. Set aside and chill. In large bowl, combine [[pineapple]], [[Ham]], [[celery]] and [[strawberries]]; mix lightly. Chill before serving. Add [[bananas]]; toss lightly just before serving. Serve in lettuce-lined bowl; top with dressing. Recipe easily doubled. However, if doubling, no need to double dressing, there is plenty so use sparingly even with a single batch.
=== Other Links ===
== See also ==
[[Category:Banana Recipes]] [[Category:Ham Recipes]] [[Category:Hawaiian Salads]] [[Category:Mayonnaise Recipes]] [[Category:Mustard seed Recipes]] [[Category:Pineapple Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Strawberry Recipes]]

== Description == Kumara([[sweet potato]]) has a lot of uses, especially nice in a salad.10 servings, 20 minutes preparation.
[[Image:1483591418.jpg|thumb|Kumara Salad (Sweet potato)]]
=== Ingredients === * 1 1/2 tablespoons [[oil]] * 2 tablespoons [[pineapple juice]] * 1 tablespoon [[lemon juice]] * 1/2 teaspoon [[salt]] * 1 dash [[onion salt]] * 3 cups cooked [[kumara]], cubed * 1 (400 g) can [[pineapple]] chunks * 1/2 cup chopped [[celery]] * 1/4 [[slivered almond]]
== Directions == Combine [[oil]], [[pineapple]] and [[lemon juice]] in bowl. Add [[salt]] and [[onion salt]]. Stir. Add kumara. Stir and allow to marinate for one hour. Add [[pineapple]], [[celery]] and [[almond]]s. Toss lightly.
=== Other Links ===
== See also ==
[[Category:Almond Recipes]] [[Category:New Zealand Recipes]] [[Category:New Zealand Salads]] [[Category:Onion salt Recipes]] [[Category:Pineapple Recipes]] [[Category:Pineapple juice Recipes]] [[Category:Potato Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Sweet potato Recipes]]

== Description ==
[[daikon|white radish]] salad.
[[Image:Labanos.jpg|thumb|Labanos Salad]]
=== Ingredients ===
* [[labanos]] ([http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Daikon white radish or Daikon] ) * [[white vinegar]] * [[tomato]]es * [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]] * [[olive oil]] * [[salt]]
== Directions ==
1. Peel [[radish]] skin. Slice peeled [[radish]] crosswise into thin slices. Sprinkle sliced [[radish]] with [[salt]], mix well until the juice oozes out of the [[radish]]. You might want to squeeze the juice out. This step is to remove the pungent taste of the [[radish]].
2. Slice [[tomato]]es into wedges.
3. Mix [[radish]] slices with [[tomato]]es, [[vinegar]], [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]] and [[olive oil]].
4. Serve cold.
=== Other Links ===
== See also ==
[[Category:Daikon Recipes]] [[Category:Filipino Recipes]] [[Category:Filipino Salads]] [[Category:Radish Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:White vinegar Recipes]]

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description ==
Salad with beans
=== Ingredients ===
* 1 can [[red kidney bean]]s * 1/2 cups [[Parsley]], chopped or dried * 1 tbls minced [[Onion]], soaked in 1/3 c. [[water]] * 2 tspn dried [[mint]] * 1 [[tomato]], chopped * 1 [[cucumber]], peeled & diced * 1/4 cups olive [[oil]] * 1/4 cups [[lemon]] juice * 1/2 tspn [[salt]] * 1/2 tspn [[pepper]] * 1 package of pita bread, cut into fourths
== Directions ==
Place beans, [[Parsley]], drained [[Onion]], [[mint]], [[tomato]] and [[cucumber]] into serving bowl. Combine olive [[oil]], [[lemon]] juice, [[salt]] and [[pepper]] and beat with a fork. Pour over vegetables, mix thoroughly. Refrigerate until ready to serve. Mix again before serving. Serve with pita.
=== Other Links ===
== See also ==
[[Category:Cucumber Recipes]] [[Category:Lebanese Recipes]] [[Category:Lebanese Salads]] [[Category:Mint Recipes]] [[Category:Recipes that need photos]] [[Category:Red kidney bean Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]]

revision.text:
{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description ==
Herb Salad
[[Image:Herb.jpg|right|Herb Salad]]
=== Ingredients ===
* 2 whole-[[Wheat]] pita bread * 3 tbls fresh [[Parsley]], chopped * 3 tbls fresh [[mint]], chopped * 3 tbls [[cilantro]], chopped * 2 scallions, thinly sliced * 1 red pepper or green [[pepper]], thinly sliced * 3 medium [[tomato]]es, diced * 4 cups [[lettuce]], chopped and washed * 1 tbls [[sumak]] * 4 tbls olive [[oil]] * 2 [[lemon]]s, juiced * 1/2 tspn [[cinnamon]] * [[salt]], to taste * fresh ground [[pepper]], to taste
== Directions ==
Place the herbs, [[lettuce]], [[cilantro]], scallions, [[pepper]] and [[tomato]]es in a bowl. Separately, whisk together the olive [[oil]], [[lemon]] juice, [[cinnamon]], [[salt]] and [[pepper]]. Toss the dressing together with the salad and let rest for 15 minutes. About 5 minutes before you want to eat, toast the pita breads and then cut each in half crossways. Cut each half into 3 strips to make 12 pieces. Arrange 6 strips around each plate and heap the salad in the middle.
=== Other Links ===
== See also ==
[[Category:Lebanese Recipes]] [[Category:Lebanese Salads]] [[Category:Lettuce Recipes]] [[Category:Lettuce Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Mint Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Wheat Recipes]]

revision.text:
{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description == Makes 6 servings. === Ingredients === * 3 cups hot cooked [[rice]] * 1/4 cup [[vinaigrette]] dressing * 2 cups cooked [[lobster]] meat cubes * 1 cup sliced fresh [[Mushroom]]s * 1/2 cup [[red pepper]] strips * 1/3 cup sliced [[black olive|ripe olives]] * 1/4 cup sliced [[green onions]] * 1 1/2 teaspoons snipped fresh [[basil]] leaves * 1 teaspoon snipped fresh [[dill]] * 1 teaspoon snipped [[chives]] * Fresh herbs (optional) == Directions == Toss [[rice]] with dressing in large bowl; cool. Add lobster meat, [[Mushroom]]s, [[pepper]], , [[onion]]s and herbs; toss lightly. Garnish with additional fresh herbs if desired. === Other Links === == See also ==
[[Category:American Salads]] [[Category:Basil Recipes]] [[Category:Black olive Recipes]] [[Category:Chives Recipes]] [[Category:Mushroom Recipes]] [[Category:Rice Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]]

== Description ==
[[Image:711675301.jpg|thumb| Magic Pan Salad]]
=== Ingredients ===
* 1/4 cup [[almond]] slivers * 1 1/2 tbl [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]] * 1/4 [[iceberg lettuce|head lettuce]] * 1/4 [[iceberg lettuce|head lettuce]] Romaine * 1 cup [[celery]], chopped * 2 x [[green onions]], chopped * 6 oz Manderin [[orange]] segments DRESSING . * 1/4 cup [[vegetable oil]] * 2 tbl [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]] * 2 tbl [[vinegar]] * 1 tbl [[parsley]], fresh, chopped * 1/2 tsp [[salt]] * 1 dsh [[pepper]] * 1 dsh [[Tabasco]]
== Directions ==
* Cook [[almond]]s in [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]] over low heat until [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]] melts and turns caramel color * They burn quickly after this). Let cool out of the pan. * Layer salad: romaine, [[lettuce]], [[celery]] and [[onion]]s. Put 2 or 2 1/2 tbsp. of dressing ontop. * Arrange [[oranges]] on top and sprinkle [[almond]]s over all.
== See also ==
[[Category:Almond Recipes]] [[Category:Colombian Recipes]] [[Category:Colombian Salads]] [[Category:Iceberg lettuce Recipes]] [[Category:Lettuce Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]]

== Description ==
[[Image:1228292659.jpg|thumb| Manderin Almond Salad]]
=== Ingredients ===
* 1/4 cup [[slivered almond]]s * 1 tbl [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]] DRESSING * 1 1/2 tsp [[salt]] * 2 tbl [[vinegar]] * 2 tbl [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]] * 1/4 cup [[vegetable oil|salad oil]] * 1 tbl [[parsley]] * 1 dsh [[pepper]] * 1 dsh Tabasco SALAD INGREDIENTS * 2 x [[butter]] [[lettuce]], * Preferred * 1 cup [[celery]], diced fine * 3 x [[green onions]],fine chopped * With tops * 11 oz [[mandarin orange]]s, drained
== Directions == * Carmelize [[almond]]s by mixing with [[Granulated sugar|Sugar]] and stirring constantly over low heat until lightly browned. * Cool on waxed paper and break into small pieces and set aside. * Combine dressing ingredients and mix wll. * Refrigerate for a few hours to marry the flavors. * Just before serving, tear [[lettuce]] into bite-size pieces and combine with [[celery]], [[onion]]s and [[mandarin orange]]s. * Toss with dressing and [[nuts]] and place on one larger piece of [[butter]] [[lettuce]] to cradle the salad. * This will serve 6 so I suggest you cut it in half.
== See also ==
[[Category:Almond Recipes]] [[Category:Colombian Recipes]] [[Category:Colombian Salads]] [[Category:Lettuce Recipes]] [[Category:Mandarin orange Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]]

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description ==
[[Image:1311218273.jpg|thumb| Marinated Bean Salad]]
=== Ingredients ===
* 1 can [[chili bean|pink beans]] - (16 oz) drained, rinsed * 1 can [[Spam]] luncheon meat - (7 oz) diced * 1/2 cup chopped [[celery]] * 1/4 cup chopped [[green bell pepper|green pepper]] * 1 tbl finely-chopped [[Onion]] * 1/4 tsp [[garlic salt]] * 1 dsh freshly-ground [[black pepper]] * 1 med [[tomato]] coarsely chopped * 1/4 cup Italian dressing * [[lettuce]] leaves
== Directions == * Combine beans, Spam, [[celery]], [[green bell pepper|green pepper]], [[Onion]], [[garlic salt]], and [[pepper]]. * Cover and refrigerate until chilled. * Just before serving, gently stir in [[tomato]]. * Pour dressing over all; mix gently but well. * Pile mixture on lettuce-lined serving plates.
== See also ==
[[Category:Chili bean Recipes]] [[Category:Colombian Recipes]] [[Category:Colombian Salads]] [[Category:Garlic salt Recipes]] [[Category:Green bell pepper Recipes]] [[Category:Lettuce Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]]

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description == Makes 6 servings. === Ingredients === * 3 cups peeled, deveined cooked [[Shrimp]], coarsely chopped * 1 small [[Onion]], minced * 1/2 cup olive or [[vegetable oil]] * Juice of three [[limes]] * [[salt]] and ground [[black pepper]] * 3 cups cooked [[rice]] * 2 large avocados, peeled, seeded, and diced * 1/2 cup chopped pitted [[green olive]]s * 3 tablespoons finely chopped [[cilantro]] * 3 jalapeno [[peppers]], seeded, deveined, and finely chopped * whole [[Shrimp]] to garnish (optional) * [[cilantro]] for garnish (optional) == Directions == Combine [[Shrimp]] and [[Onion]] in large mixing bowl. Whisk [[oil]] into [[lime juice]]; add [[salt]] and [[pepper]] to taste. Pour dressing over [[Shrimp]] and [[Onion]]; marinate two hours.
Add [[rice]], avocados, , [[cilantro]] and jalapeno [[peppers]]; toss lightly but thoroughly. Garnish with whole [[Shrimp]] and [[cilantro]] sprigs, if desired. === Other Links === == See also ==
[[Category:American Salads]] [[Category:Black olive Recipes]] [[Category:Green olive Recipes]] [[Category:Green olive Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Lime Recipes]] [[Category:Lime juice Recipes]] [[Category:Rice Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]]

revision.comment: clean up, replaced: [[garlic|clove garlic]] → clove [[garlic]], removed: {{Wikifiedrecipe}}
revision.text:
== Description == Makes 6 servings. === Ingredients === * 1/4 cup fresh [[lime juice]] * 3 tablespoons [[olive oil]] * 1 clove [[garlic]], minced * 1 teaspoon [[chili powder]] * 1/4 teaspoon [[salt]] * 2 cups cooked [[Turkey]] breast, cut into 1/2-inch cubes * 1 medium red pepper, cut into thin strips * 1/3 cup sliced [[green onions]] * 2 tablespoons chopped fresh [[cilantro]] or [[parsley]] * 2 serrano or jalapeno [[peppers]], stemmed, seeded, and minced * 3 cups cooked [[rice]], cooled * 2 medium [[avocado]]s, cut into chunks * [[lettuce]] leaves == Directions == Blend [[lime juice]], [[oil]], [[garlic]], [[chili powder]] and [[salt]] in large bowl. Add [[Turkey]], [[pepper]], [[onion]]s, [[cilantro]] and [[chile pepper|hot peppers]]. Toss lightly. Cover and refrigerate 2 to 3 hours.
Add [[rice]] and [[avocado]] chunks. Toss lightly. Serve in bowl lined with [[lettuce]] leaves. === Other Links === == See also ==
[[Category:American Salads]] [[Category:Avocado Recipes]] [[Category:Chile pepper Recipes]] [[Category:Chili powder Recipes]] [[Category:Lettuce Recipes]] [[Category:Lime juice Recipes]] [[Category:Rice Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]]

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description ==
[[Image:1076910200.jpg|thumb| Maytag Bleu Cheese Vinaigrette]]
=== Ingredients ===
* 3 pt [[olive oil]] * 1 pt [[cider vinegar]] * 1 lb Maytag [[bleu cheese]], crumbled * 3 oz [[heavy cream]] * TT [[black pepper]] * TT [[kosher salt]]
== Directions ==
* Combine all of the above and mix to a smooth consistency. * Adjust seasoning * Chill before serving!
== See also ==
[[Category:Cheese Recipes]] [[Category:Cider vinegar Recipes]] [[Category:Heavy cream Recipes]] [[Category:Kosher salt Recipes]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Venezuelan Recipes]] [[Category:Venezuelan Salads]]

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description ==
[[Image:1057515701.jpg|thumb| Meat Salad]]
=== Ingredients ===
* 1 cup Julienne strips of cooked of [[Beef]], [[Veal]], or [[Lamb]]
* 1 cup Julienne strips of baked
* 1 tbl Minced [[Onion]] * 6 tbl [[vegetable oil|salad oil]] * 2 tbl [[cider vinegar]] * 1/2 tsp [[pepper]] * 1 tsp Minced [[parsley]] * 1/4 cup [[heavy cream]] or [[sour cream]] * 1 x Hard boiled [[egg]], sliced * 1 x Boiled or pickled [[beet]],
== Directions ==
* Mix cut meats with [[Onion]]. * Beat together [[oil]], [[vinegar]], [[pepper]] and [[parsley]]. * Stir [[cream]] into dressing. * Mix with meats combining lightly. * Garnish with sliced [[egg]] and [[beet]].
== See also ==
[[Category:Beef Recipes]] [[Category:Beet Recipes]] [[Category:Cider vinegar Recipes]] [[Category:Heavy cream Recipes]] [[Category:Lamb Recipes]] [[Category:Norwegian Recipes]] [[Category:Norwegian Salads]] [[Category:Salad Recipes]] [[Category:Veal Recipes]]

{{Wikifiedrecipe}} == Description == Serves 6 [[Image:553132822.jpg|thumb| Meat Salad - Kjød Salat]]
== Ingredients == * 2 cups [[Lamb]], [[Veal]] or [[Beef]] * 10 [[Anchovy|Anchovies]] -- cleaned and boned * 8 [[pickled onions]] * [[lettuce]] leaves * ¼ teaspoon dry [[mustard]] * ½ teaspoon [[salt]] * ¼ teaspoon [[pepper]] * 1 tablespoon [[vinegar]] * 3 tablespoons [[tomato]] pureé * 3 tablespoons [[olive oil]] * 1 teaspoon [[parsley]] -- chopped
== Directions ==
Add all ingredients and beat until well blended.
== See also ==
